markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ceremony of Protection](/Feats.aspx?ID=2776) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Conrasu" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=343" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 108 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You manipulate your exoskeleton to overlap itself. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn.

<title level="2">Ceremony of Protection leads to...</title>
[Ceremony of Fortification](/Feats.aspx?ID=2785)
name: Ceremony of Protection
